meaningMnemonic: An <kanji>exhibit</kanji> of things in a <kanji>row</kanji> only happens at an <vocabulary>exhibition</vocabulary>. Everything will be neatly lined up on <vocabulary>display</vocabulary> for you there.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
